mapper.sql: permission_id, name, path, parent_id, icon, component, sort, keep_status, type, create_time, update_time, del_flag, permission_desc
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from sys_permission
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_permission
permission_id,
name,
path,
parent_id,
icon,
component,
sort,
keep_status,
type,
create_time,
update_time,
del_flag,
permission_desc,

mapper.update:
update sys_permission
permission_id = #{record.permissionId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{record.name,jdbcType=INTEGER},
path = #{record.path,jdbcType=INTEGER},
parent_id = #{record.parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
icon = #{record.icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
component = #{record.component,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sort = #{record.sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
keep_status = #{record.keepStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
type = #{record.type,jdbcType=CHAR},
create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
del_flag = #{record.delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
permission_desc = #{record.permissionDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update sys_permission set permission_id = #{record.permissionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{record.name,jdbcType=INTEGER}, path = #{record.path,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parent_id = #{record.parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, icon = #{record.icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, component = #{record.component,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort = #{record.sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, keep_status = #{record.keepStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, type = #{record.type,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_flag = #{record.delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, permission_desc = #{record.permissionDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sys_permission
name = #{name,jdbcType=INTEGER},
path = #{path,jdbcType=INTEGER},
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
component = #{component,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
keep_status = #{keepStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
permission_desc = #{permissionDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where permission_id = #{permissionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update sys_permission set name = #{name,jdbcType=INTEGER}, path = #{path,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, component = #{component,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, keep_status = #{keepStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, permission_desc = #{permissionDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where permission_id = #{permissionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
